Description of incident: Gallant Risk and Insurances Services notified customers of a potential data breach when their offices were broken into and several company laptops were stolen. The laptops were password protected according to the company. The company did not disclose what type of information may have been stored on the laptops. The company is providing ID theft protection through Kroll free for one year. For those affected call 1-855-330-6366 from 8:00 a.m to 5:00 p.m Central Time. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-56236
